hero.title: Wellnista
hero.subtitle: Design Your Happier Wellness Life Through Forest Bathing & Sound Healing
hero.description: Promote longevity and well-being through natural, evidence-based wellness approaches including forest bathing (Shinrin-yoku) and therapeutic sound healing in Thailand

about.title: What is Wellnista?
about.missionText: To promote longevity and well-being through natural, evidence-based approaches including forest bathing and sound healing. Creating harmony between people and nature through transformative Thai wellness tourism experiences.
about.visionText: To be Thailand's leading wellness and longevity destination, offering transformative forest bathing, sound healing, and holistic experiences that nurture body, mind, and spirit through the healing power of nature.

activities.subtitle: Discover our holistic wellness and longevity activities

forestBathing.title: Forest Bathing (Shinrin-yoku)

wellnessFood.title: Wellness Food Workshop
wellnessFood.description: Learn to prepare nutritious Thai wellness cuisine with local ingredients

services.title: Our Wellness & Longevity Services
services.forestBathingDescription: Connect with nature through guided forest bathing therapy sessions that reduce stress, boost immunity, and enhance longevity wellness
services.soundHealingDescription: Experience deep relaxation, longevity, and healing through therapeutic sound healing vibrations and meditation practices
services.wellnessCookingDescription: Learn to prepare nutritious Thai wellness cuisine for longevity using fresh, local, and organic ingredients
services.pilatesDescription: Strengthen your core, improve flexibility, and enhance longevity through mindful Pilates movement and breath work
services.herbalWorkshopsDescription: Discover the healing properties of traditional Thai herbs and create your own natural wellness and longevity products
